valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 27 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 28 Nov 2025

Southerly, becoming cyclonic, then becoming southwesterly later, 6 to gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6 for a time.

Occasional rain.

Moderate or poor, occasionally good.
